poolCalculator.title: You Plaza Izumo Fee Calculator
poolCalculator.publicInfoNote: This is a trial calculation tool based on public information. Please check the latest facility information for the final amount.
poolCalculator.lockerRequired: Locker is required when using the pool
poolCalculator.lockerShareNote: Locker can be shared by about 2 people, but not by 3 or more due to space.
poolCalculator.noRows: No rows. Please select an item from the checkboxes above.

note.lockerDetail: A changing room locker ({price} yen/each) is required when using the pool. It can be shared by about 2 people, but due to the changing space, it cannot be shared by 3 or more.
note.discount: Disability discount: half price for admission and membership (rounded down). Equipment is regular price.
note.coupon: Coupon book: Only the purchase price for a book of 11 tickets is calculated (not the number of uses).
note.family: Special categories such as family members of members are not supported.

poolCalculator.footer: *This is an unofficial reference tool. Please check the official facility information for the latest fees and conditions.

category.student: Elementary, Junior High & High School Student

poolCalculator.groupTariffWarning: Group rates apply for a total of 20 or more people (currently: {count})
poolCalculator.groupTariffSuggest: For 20 or more people, please select the group rate (20+)
poolCalculator.gymFreeNote: Free for pool users and members
poolCalculator.clearAllDescription: Clear all selected items and reset calculation
poolCalculator.addLockerDescription: Add locker service required for pool use
poolCalculator.publicInfoLinkDescription: Open the official You Plaza Izumo pricing information page in a new tab
poolCalculator.lockerDetailPageLink: Go to locker details information page

accessPage.title: Access Map
accessPage.summerHours: Summer holidays: 9:00 AM ~ 9:00 PM (Last admission 8:30 PM)
accessPage.closedDaysDetail: Every Thursday (except holidays) · New Year holidays · Maintenance closure (February)
accessPage.sliderHours: Water Slider & Rodeo Mountain Operating Hours
accessPage.trainAccessDetail: Walking distance from JR Nishi-Izumo Station (right at West Exit)
accessPage.busAccessDetail: 15 minutes by bus - Susanoo Kanko 'Heisei Onsen Line - You Plaza-mae' stop
accessPage.busNote: ※Check timetable and fare table on Susanoo Kanko external site
accessPage.fromYonagoRoute1: • Turn right at Izumo IC exit on San-in Expressway (about 5 min)
accessPage.fromYonagoRoute2: • If using Route 9: Turn left at 'Kando Intersection' about 5km west from Izumo city center
accessPage.fromHamadaRoute2: • Turn right at 'Kando Intersection' about 15km east after entering Izumo city
accessPage.fromHiroshimaRoute1: • Hamada Expressway → Hamada IC → Route 9 eastbound toward Izumo
accessPage.fromHiroshimaRoute2: • Chugoku Expressway → Miyoshi IC → Route 54 northbound toward Izumo
accessPage.detailInfoDesc: Please check the official website for the latest operating hours and fees.
